text: Anneke Scholtens (28 July 1955 â€“ 11 February 2025) was a Dutch children's book writer. She wrote multiple books in the Fritzi series and wrote the books series Het geheim van (The secret of). She published her last book in 2024, Idris, slaaf van Rome (Idris, Slave of Rome). Scholtens died at place of residence, Amsterdam, on 11 February 2025, at the age of 69 from a long illnesss. ==References== Category:Dutch writers Category:1955 births Category:2025 deaths Category:People from South Holland
title: Anneke Scholtens
